column1: Let’s Make Your Visa Process Easy!
Welcome to your Visa Application Journey!
<!-- Intro paragraph with manual line break -->
Our guided process, along with the support of a TTK Visa Consultant will help you complete this journey with ease.
What to expect at the end of this process
Look for your downloadable Docket. Your filled Visa Application Form will be automatically generated, ready for you to print and sign.

An instruction sheet in the Docket will tell you exactly what to carry, including originals, copies,
and any additional documents.

Our team will continuously review your details and documents to ensure everything is in order.
if you need anything at any time, our consultant will always be there to help you.
A dedicated Visa Consultant will be assigned to assist and guide you at every step.
For added convenience, you can choose from a range of Add-On Services during your application journey.
All your traveller details will be submitted and saved securely.

<!-- Follow these steps carefully to ensure smooth processing of your Schengen visa application: -->
Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know about each field in this section.
Visa Processing time, Validity of Visa, Number of Entries and Duration of the visa are solely at the discretion of the issuing visa officer or consulate, regardless of the documents submitted.
• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.
• Processing duration may vary. Final decision is at the discretion of the Embassy/Consulate.
• Consular officers may request additional documents or a personal interview if required.
details below. If you have any questions, you can contact us.
Please review your Visa Request details below.
details below. If you have any questions, you can contact us. -->

<!-- Follow these steps carefully to ensure smooth processing of your Schengen visa application: -->
Need help with this part? Here’ss what you need to know about each field
If you have already scheduled your visa appointment with the
respective embassy/consulate, then upload the confirmation here for
Request assistance from TTK Visa consultant to book an appointment on
your behalf. Once you update your passport and address proof sections,
TTK Visa Consultant will reach out to you to share the latest
available slots and location prior to scheduling.
• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.
• Processing duration may vary. Final decision is at the discretion of the Embassy/Consulate.
• Consular officers may request additional documents or a personal interview if required.

Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know.
To ensure your application goes smoothly, please make sure your Passport meets the following requirements:
Kindly upload your passport copy as requested. We shall  automatically capture your passport information using advanced document reader capabilities.
Once the file is uploaded, kindly review all the relevant fields to ensure they match exactly with the details on your passport.
If you notice any discrepancies or missing information, please update the fields manually.
Your passport information serves as the primary source for other sections of your application. Ensuring its accuracy is essential for a smooth and error-free process.

All validations and review shall be performed on the soft copy uploaded. In case of any discrepancies on the original document received or filed during submission by the applicant at Visa Application Centre or with TTK for filing, then TTK will not be responsible for any liability or delay in filing or unable to file the application with the authorities or on the visa outcome.
Please upload the images of your Passport to auto-fill the details below. For detailed guidelines on this, click on the
in the top-right corner of this section.

Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know.
Always get your photo clicked at a professional studio, as per the photo specification guideline provided.
Avoid selfies or old passport photos or photos used for your earlier visa request.
Ensure the photo is recent (taken within the last 6 months) and reflects your current appearance—especially if your look has changed.
Old or unclear photos may cause delays in processing. We recommend to avoid Photos used during your previous visa application
This ensures faster processing and prevents rejection due to minor errors.
<!-- Full width wrapper with 10% left and right padding -->
• Close up of your head and top of your shoulders so that your face takes up 70–80% of the photograph
• Of high quality with no ink marks or creases
• Show you looking directly at the camera
• Be printed on high quality paper, and at high resolution
Photographs taken with a digital camera must be high quality colour and printed on photo-quality paper.
You can fill your address using your passport, or provide an alternative ID to verify your address.
in the top-right corner of this section.

• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.

Please ensure that all travel details are accurately entered in this section, including:
Upload hotel reservations, Airbnb confirmations, or any other proof of stay for the entire duration of your trip. -->
Your complete travel itinerary (entry and exit dates, destinations)
If you’re visiting multiple cities or countries, make sure you include accommodation details for each stop. -->
Accommodation details, whether staying at a hotel or with an inviting person
The check-in/check-out dates should align with your travel itinerary and transportation bookings. -->
Accurate and complete information is essential to ensure the consistency and correctness of your visa application package.
If you're staying with friends or family, upload a signed Invitation Letter from your host, along with a copy of their ID or proof of residence. -->
Incomplete or incorrect entries may lead to processing delays or rejection.
You can upload a single file with all your accommodation details, or multiple files, whatever is easier for you.
We can help create a sample plan for you, just choose our Add-On Service.

column1: Visit the Add-On Cart to avail this service for a small fee.
Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know.
Schengen Travel Insurance is a mandatory requirement for Indian
travellers visiting any of the 29 Schengen countries. This
region-specific travel medical policy offers essential coverage for
medical emergencies, hospitalisation, trip delays, cancellations,
To obtain a Schengen visa, non-EU visitors must have travel insurance
with a minimum medical coverage of EUR 30,000.
You can either upload your existing travel insurance or request TTK
Visa Consultant’s assistance to help you secure a policy tailored to
The visa application requires you to carry a copy of your Travel Insurance for the Schengen country you are visiting. For detailed guidelines on this,
in the top-right corner of this section.

<!-- Follow these steps carefully to ensure smooth processing of your Schengen visa application: -->
Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know about each field
Please upload your salary slips for the last 6 months.
Recently joined employees: Upload your offer letter from your current
employer along with payslips and relieving letter from your previous
Not employed: Select “I’ll provide my Salary Slips directly during the
Country-specific requirement: For certain countries, salary slips must
carry the original seal and signature of your employer. TTK Visa
Consultant will advise if this applies to your case.
• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.
• Processing duration may vary. Final decision is at the discretion of the Embassy/Consulate.
• Consular officers may request additional documents or a personal interview if required.
The visa application requires you to carry your Original Salary Slips with your company’s seal and signature.
For detailed guideline on this, click on
in the top-right corner of this section.
Visa Application requires you to carry your Salary Slip of last 6
months as part of the visa application filing process. For more detailed
in the top-right corner of this section.
If you’d like us to review your Salary Slips to make sure it meets the guidelines, please upload it here.
If your current employment is under 3 months, submit the payslip from your previous employer

<!-- Follow these steps carefully to ensure smooth processing of your Schengen visa application: -->
Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know about each field
Please upload your bank statements for the last 6 months.
Primary account: Upload statements from your operating bank account –
Specific to Joint Account: If using a joint account with your partner,
parents, or children, upload both your salary account statements and
No statement available: Select “I’ll provide my Bank Statement
directly during the appointment” to skip this step.
Country-specific rule: Some countries require statements to bear the
original seal and signature of the bank. Your Visa Consultant will
confirm if this applies to your case.
• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.
• Processing duration may vary. Final decision is at the discretion of the Embassy/Consulate.
• Consular officers may request additional documents or a personal interview if required.
The visa application requires you to carry your original Bank Statements covering the last 12 months with your Bank’s seal & signature. For detailed guideline, click on
in the top-right corner of this section.

<!-- Follow these steps carefully to ensure smooth processing of your Schengen visa application: -->
Need help with this part? Here’s what you need to know about each field
Please upload your Income Tax Returns (ITR) for the last 3 years.
• No ITR filed: Upload Form 16 for the last 3 years.
Recently employed / within one year / not taxable: Select “I have not
filed my Income Tax Returns” and proceed.
• All documents must be printed on A4 size sheets only.
• All applicants must book an appointment online to submit their visa application and biometric data at the Schengen visa application centre.
• Required documents must be submitted with the visa application (no fax or email to Embassy accepted).
• Only documents listed in the checklist will be accepted.
• If your visa has been refused previously, you must submit the refusal notice or a written explanation of the reason for travel and refusal.
• TTK will review your documents and suggest necessary changes before submission.
• TTK will book an appointment as per jurisdiction at the Visa Application Centre (VAC), subject to slot availability. Inform TTK of your tentative dates at the earliest.
• Applicants must visit the VAC in person to provide biometric fingerprint data with a signed application form, appointment letter, and checklist documents.
• Alternatively, TTK can submit the application if the applicant qualifies for biometric waiver due to previous Schengen visa issuance.
• Courier service is available by filling out the 'Courier Request Form'. The passport will be sent to the address mentioned in the form.
• Standard processing time: 10 to 15 business days from the date of application at the VFS Application Centre.
• Processing duration may vary. Final decision is at the discretion of the Embassy/Consulate.
• Consular officers may request additional documents or a personal interview if required.
